infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to show your position on the map, and to help us generate the nearest and more relevant recommendations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to show your position on the map and to help us generate the nearest and more relevant recommendations.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Allow this app to collect app-related data that can be used for tracking you or your device for advertisers.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location. Your location is used to help generate your nearest recommendations.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.

plugins.userTrackingPermission: Allow this app to collect app-related data that can be used for tracking you or your device for advertisers..
